summary: This appears to be an email forwarding an inmate personal property record for Jeffrey Epstein dated July 15, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The email includes an attachment titled 'Inmate Personal Property Record 7-15-2019 Epstein TRUSCOPE all log' and is addressed to an Associate Warden at MCC New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate personal property record being forwarded via email. He is identified as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Epstein Inmate Property Record Created
events.description: An inmate personal property record for Jeffrey Epstein was created at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A personal property record for inmate Jeffrey Epstein was created on July 15, 2019.
The record was handled by the Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The email includes an attachment titled 'Inmate Personal Property Record 7-15-2019 Epstein TRUSCOPE all log'.
